short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer Tools extension to view IBM Security Access Manager log files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--Disclaimer 
THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL (AND SUPPORTED) IBM EXTENSION
THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL (AND SUPPORTED) IBM EXTENSION
THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL (AND SUPPORTED) IBM EXTENSION
THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL (AND SUPPORTED) IBM EXTENSION
--End of disclaimer

IBM Security Access Manager (ISAM) is an IBM all-in-one solution which provides capabilities such web sso, federated sso, multi-factor authentication (biometric, totp, ...), risk/context based access, API protection, and so on.

This application will let you have access to your ISAM log files directly from your Chrome developer tools, which can be convenient (for example when troubleshooting a custom InfoMap !)

Basic (but convenient) features such a traceString() filter, a snoop parser, or a button to enable trace level 9 when needed, are also provided.

/!\ Warning : this extension is not (yet ?) compatible with docker-based ISAM environments.


PS : THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL (AND SUPPORTED) IBM EXTENSION
